body_html:
These errors seem to come from attempting to pickle a Python function, which I didn't think was supported by the standard pickle module

I think that should work in most circumstances. It would be interesting to see why exactly GeneratorEnqueuer.start.<locals>.data_generator_task' is not picklable.

Is it possible that use_multiprocessing=True just doesn't work on Windows?

That's an acceptable outcome. It would need to be documented.

body:
> These errors seem to come from attempting to pickle a Python function, which I didn't think was supported by the standard pickle module

I think that should work in most circumstances. It would be interesting to see why exactly `GeneratorEnqueuer.start.<locals>.data_generator_task'` is not picklable.

> Is it possible that use_multiprocessing=True just doesn't work on Windows?

That's an acceptable outcome. It would need to be documented.
